lead_paragraph: Companies are seeking to grow through mergers and acquisitions, and as their appetite grows, so too does their willingness to consider more aggressive moves.
snippet: Companies are seeking to grow through mergers and acquisitions, and as their appetite grows, so too does their willingness to consider more aggressive moves.

headline.main: The Pace of Deal-Making Picks Up
headline.seo: The Pace of Corporate Deal-Making Is Accelerating
headline.print_headline: The Pace of Deal-Making Picks Up

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED
